import React, { useState } from "react" import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles" import { Button, Drawer, List, ListItem, ListItemText, Container, AppBar, Toolbar, } from "@material-ui/core" import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { CssBaseline } from "@material-ui/core" const styles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ drawerPaper: { width: "inherit", flexShrink: 0, whiteSpace: "nowrap", }, link: { textDecoration: "none", color: "grey", }, appHeader: { zIndex: "1400", }, toolbar: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "flex-end", padding: theme.spacing(0, 1), // necessary for content to be below app bar ...theme.mixins.toolbar, }, content: { flexGrow: 1, padding: theme.spacing(3), }, drawer: {}, })) export default function AppDrawer() { const classes = styles() const [drawerState, setDrawerState] = useState(false) const toggleDrawer = (open) => { if (drawerState == false) { setDrawerState(true) } else { setDrawerState(false) } } return (
toggleDrawer(false)}> HOME toggleDrawer(false)}*/> HELP
